hibernate-mapping.query: select new commonDTO( c.Cur, c.Description, c.Symbol, c.Month1Ammount, c.Month2Ammount, c.Month3Ammount, c.Month4Ammount, c.Month5Ammount, c.Month6Ammount, c.Month7Ammount, c.Month8Ammount, c.Month9Ammount, c.Month10Ammount, c.Month11Ammount, c.Month12Ammount) from Currency as c where c.Active = true

update Currency c set c.Month1Ammount = :month1Amount, c.Month2Ammount = :month2Amount, c.Month3Ammount = :month3Amount, c.Month4Ammount = :month4Amount, c.Month5Ammount = :month5Amount, c.Month6Ammount = :month6Amount, c.Month7Ammount = :month7Amount, c.Month8Ammount = :month8Amount, c.Month9Ammount = :month9Amount, c.Month10Ammount = :month10Amount, c.Month11Ammount = :month11Amount, c.Month12Ammount = :month12Amount, c.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where c.Cur = :cur and c.Symbol =:symbol and c.Active = true

update Currency c set c.Month1Ammount = 0, c.Month2Ammount = 0, c.Month3Ammount = 0, c.Month4Ammount = 0, c.Month5Ammount = 0, c.Month6Ammount = 0, c.Month7Ammount = 0, c.Month8Ammount = 0, c.Month9Ammount = 0, c.Month10Ammount = 0, c.Month11Ammount = 0, c.Month12Ammount = 0, c.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where c.Cur = :cur and c.Symbol =:symbol and c.Active = true

update Currency c set c.Month1Ammount = 0, c.Month2Ammount = 0, c.Month3Ammount = 0, c.Month4Ammount = 0, c.Month5Ammount = 0, c.Month6Ammount = 0, c.Month7Ammount = 0, c.Month8Ammount = 0, c.Month9Ammount = 0, c.Month10Ammount = 0, c.Month11Ammount = 0, c.Month12Ammount = 0, c.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where c.Active = true
select new curdto(c.Cur) from Currency as c where c.Active = true order by c.Cur

select new curdto( c.Cur,c.Description,c.Symbol,c.FirstInWord,c.SecondInWord,c.IsHomeCur,c.CodeForCOA ) from Currency as c where ( c.Cur =: cur or c.Description =: desp or c.Symbol =: symbol ) and c.Active = true

select new curdto( c.Cur, c.Description, c.Symbol, c.FirstInWord, c.SecondInWord, c.IsHomeCur, c.CodeForCOA, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from Currency as c where ( c.Cur =: cur or c.Description =: desp )

select new curdto( c.Cur, c.Description, c.Symbol, c.FirstInWord, c.SecondInWord, c.IsHomeCur, c.CodeForCOA, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from Currency as c where c.Active = true

select new curdto( c.Cur, c.Description, c.Symbol, c.FirstInWord, c.SecondInWord, c.IsHomeCur, c.CodeForCOA, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from Currency as c where c.Cur = :cur and c.Active = true

select new curdto( c.Cur, c.Description, c.Symbol, c.FirstInWord, c.SecondInWord, c.IsHomeCur, c.CodeForCOA, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from Currency as c where c.Active = true and c.IsHomeCur = true
